1.name: Bread
1.description: Basic food item that can be found anywhere.

3.name: Torch
3.description: A piece of wood you can set on fire for light.

5.name: Bandages
5.description: Strips of linen used to staunch bleeding. Not the most efficient way of stopping bleeding, but portable.

6.name: Surgery Kit
6.description: Contains everything you need to perform surgery on yourself. A very painful process. Heals 5 pain (modified by grit), and heavily increases fatigue. Does not heal level 5 wounds.
